name: StockMarketHelp
0:
”Alexa, open Stock Market Help”
”Alexa, start Stock Market Help”
”Alexa, launch Stock Market Help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stock market help
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Stock Market Help contains definitions for an abundance of stock market terms for beginners, students, professionals, and anyone interested in investing. Often when listening to stock market shows, videos or podcasts you'll hear terminology used throughout as investors and analysts are speaking. This can also happen when you're reading an article about a stock or the stock market and you'll notice that you've come across terms that you may have forgotten or not know at all. With this skill you'll be able to better understand what's being said about a specific company or the market in general quickly and effectively. Equip yourself with the terminology knowledge that's necessary to better understand the stock market and investing with the Stock Market Help skill.

To use this skill simply open it and say the name of a term that you want a definition for. This Stock Market Help help skill contains Stock Market Help Pro, which is the premium upgrade content that's available as an in-skill purchase which gives you access to several ratio terms and definitions. However, without the upgrade, this skill still has a lot of terms in its catalog. 

Examples of terms in this skill initially include; hedge, margin, call option, put option, short selling, bear market, bull market, averaging down, protective put, limit order, and a lot more! 

Enjoy! Take care!
